content:
UnobtrusiveValidationMode Enum

Definition

Specifies behavior of unobtrusive validation.

In this Article

public enum UnobtrusiveValidationMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
UnobtrusiveValidationMode

Fields

None

Unobtrusive validation is not enabled.
WebForms

Unobtrusive validation is enabled and uses Web Forms validation scripts.
